revision.text:
{{Wiktionary|be}} '''be''', or '''BE''' may refer to: {{TOC right}} == Linguistics == *''[[To be]]'', the English copular verb *[[Be (Cyrillic)]], a letter of the Cyrillic alphabet *[[Be (interjection)|''be'' (interjection)]] *[[Be language]] or Ong Be, a language of northern Hainan province, China
==Geography== *[[Bé]], a neighborhood in Togo
== Music == ===Albums=== *[[Be (Beady Eye album)|''Be'' (Beady Eye album)]], 2013 *[[Be (Casiopea album)|''Be'' (Casiopea album)]], 1998 *[[Be (Common album)|''Be'' (Common album)]], 2005 *[[Be (Pain of Salvation album)|''Be'' (Pain of Salvation album)]], 2004 **[[Be (video)|''Be'' (concert DVD)]] ===Songs=== *[[Be (Neil Diamond song)|"Be" (Neil Diamond song)]], a 1973 single *"Be", a song by Jessica Simpson from ''[[In This Skin]]'' *"Be", a song by Slade from ''[[Whatever Happened to Slade]]''.
== Businesses and organisations == *[[Be Inc.]], a former US software company (1990-2001) and developer of the Be Operating System (see BeOS) *[[Be Unlimited]], a former UK Internet service provider (2003-2014) ==Acronyms and codes== *[[British English]] *[[Business English]] *[[Belarusian language]] (ISO 639 alpha-2 code BE) === Places === *[[Belgium]], ISO 3166-1 and FIPS 10-4 country code BE **[[.be]], the country code top-level domain for Belgium *[[Berlin]], a state of Germany *[[Bermuda]]'s World Meteorological Organization, territory code BE *[[Canton of Berne]], a canton of Switzerland === Transport === *[[Baltimore,_Chesapeake_and_Atlantic_Railway#Baltimore_and_Eastern_Railroad_Company_(1923-1982)|Baltimore and Eastern Railroad Company (1923-1982)]], successor to Baltimore, Chesapeake and Atlantic Railway *[[Beriev]], a Russian aircraft manufacturer *[[Flybe]] (IATA airline code BE), based in Exeter, England *[[British European Airways]] (IATA airline code BE until 1974) ===Other businesses and organizations=== *[[BearingPoint]] (former stock ticker symbol BE) *{{lang|pt|[[Bloco de Esquerda]]}} or Left Bloc, a Portuguese political party *[[Bob Evans Restaurants]], an American restaurant chain === Science and technology === *[[Bachelor of Engineering]], an academic degree *[[Backup Exec]] (BE), a backup and recovery solution from Veritas Software *[[Base excess]] (BE), excess or deficit in the amount of base in the blood *[[Baumé scale]] (°Bé), a density scale *[[Be star]], in astronomy, a B-type star *[[Bejan number]], in thermodynamics and fluid mechanics *[[Beryllium]] (Be), a chemical element === Sport === *[[Badminton Europe]], the governing body of badminton in Europe *[[British Eventing]], the British governing body for the equestrian sport of eventing ===Timekeeping=== *[[Bahá'í Era]], in timekeeping *[[Buddhist Era]], in timekeeping
== See also == *[[B (disambiguation)]] *[[Bay (disambiguation)]] *[[BBE (disambiguation)]] *[[Bebe (disambiguation)]] *[[Bee (disambiguation)]] {{disambiguation}}
